headline.main: Trump Assails Clinton and Bush on China

docs.snippet: Donald Trump criticized Hillary Rodham Clinton and Jeb Bush for what he called their weak stance on China at a Republican dinner in Hot Springs, Ark....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump criticized Hillary Rodham Clinton and Jeb Bush for what he called their weak stance on China at a Republican dinner in Hot Springs, Ark.

headline.main: Davis Cup: Argentina Beats Serbia to Return to Semifinals
headline.print_headline: Davis Cup: Argentina Beats Serbia to Return to Semifinals

docs.snippet: Carlos Berlocq and Leonardo Mayer defeated Serbia's Viktor Troicki and Nenad Zimonjic 6-2, 6-4, 6-1 on Saturday, sending host Argentina back to the Davis Cup semifinals and keeping it on track for its first title....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carlos Berlocq and Leonardo Mayer defeated Serbia's Viktor Troicki and Nenad Zimonjic 6-2, 6-4, 6-1 on Saturday, sending host Argentina back to the Davis Cup semifinals and keeping it on track for its first title.

headline.main: Militant Attack Kills 11 Algerian Soldiers: Security Source
headline.print_headline: Militant Attack Kills 11 Algerian Soldiers: Security Source

docs.snippet: At least 11 Algerian soldiers were killed after they were attacked by Islamist militant gunmen west of the capital Algiers, a security source said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: At least 11 Algerian soldiers were killed after they were attacked by Islamist militant gunmen west of the capital Algiers, a security source said on Saturday.

headline.main: Exclusive: Tennessee Suspect Texted Friend Link to Koranic Verse Before Attack
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Tennessee Suspect Texted Friend Link to Koranic Verse Before Attack

docs.snippet: The suspected gunman in Thursday's attack that killed four U.S. marines and a navy officer returned from a trip to Jordan in 2014 angry about conflicts in the Middle East and the reluctance of regional governments and the United States to interven...
docs.lead_paragraph: The suspected gunman in Thursday's attack that killed four U.S. marines and a navy officer returned from a trip to Jordan in 2014 angry about conflicts in the Middle East and the reluctance of regional governments and the United States to intervene, a close friend of his told Reuters on Saturday.

headline.main: U.S., Allies Target Islamic State With 23 Air Strikes in Iraq: Military
headline.print_headline: U.S., Allies Target Islamic State With 23 Air Strikes in Iraq: Military

docs.snippet: The United States and its allies bombarded Islamic State in Iraq on Friday with 23 air strikes, hitting the militant group near Tal Afar and Ramadi, the U.S. military said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States and its allies bombarded Islamic State in Iraq on Friday with 23 air strikes, hitting the militant group near Tal Afar and Ramadi, the U.S. military said on Saturday.

headline.main: Merkel Ally Urges German MPs Who Voted Against Greek Aid Talks to Rethink
headline.print_headline: Merkel Ally Urges German MPs Who Voted Against Greek Aid Talks to Rethink

docs.snippet: The general secretary of Chancellor Angela Merkel's Christian Democrats has urged lawmakers who voted against opening talks on a third financial rescue for Greece to reconsider....
docs.lead_paragraph: The general secretary of Chancellor Angela Merkel's Christian Democrats has urged lawmakers who voted against opening talks on a third financial rescue for Greece to reconsider.

headline.main: Ex-FIFA Official Webb Pleads Not Guilty to U.S. Charges
headline.print_headline: Ex-FIFA Official Webb Pleads Not Guilty to U.S. Charges

docs.snippet: Jeffrey Webb, one of seven high-ranking officials of soccer's world governing body FIFA who were arrested in Switzerland on corruption charges, pleaded not guilty in U.S. federal court on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Webb, one of seven high-ranking officials of soccer's world governing body FIFA who were arrested in Switzerland on corruption charges, pleaded not guilty in U.S. federal court on Saturday.

headline.main: Four Killed by Possible Carbon Monoxide in Maine Cabin: Authorities
headline.print_headline: Four Killed by Possible Carbon Monoxide in Maine Cabin: Authorities

docs.snippet: Four people were found dead in cabin in a remote part of Maine in what investigators believe was carbon monoxide poisoning, authorities said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four people were found dead in cabin in a remote part of Maine in what investigators believe was carbon monoxide poisoning, authorities said on Saturday.
